name: R4B-MedicationRequest-R5-MedicationRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B MedicationRequest into FHIR R5

element.display: Ordering of medication for patient or group

target.display: Ordering of medication for patient or group
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest`
R4B `MedicationRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.authoredOn`

target.display: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.basedOn`

target.display: Grouping or category of medication request
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.category`
R4B `MedicationRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.contained`
R4B `MedicationRequest.courseOfTherapyType` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.courseOfTherapyType` - courseOfTherapyType changed the binding strength from Example to Extensible
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest`

element.display: Minimum period of time between dispenses

target.display: Minimum period of time between dispenses
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.dispenseInterval` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.dispenseInterval`

element.display: Number of days supply per dispense

target.display: Number of days supply per dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.expectedSupplyDuration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.expectedSupplyDuration`

R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.id`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.duration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.duration`

R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill.quantity`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.numberOfRepeatsAllowed` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.numberOfRepeatsAllowed`

element.display: Amount of medication to supply per dispense

target.display: Amount of medication to supply per dispense
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.quantity`

element.display: Time period supply is authorized for

target.display: Time period supply is authorized for
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.validityPeriod` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.validityPeriod`

element.display: True if request is prohibiting action

target.display: True if patient is to stop taking or not to start taking the medication
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.doNotPerform` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.doNotPerform`

element.display: How the medication should be taken

target.display: Specific instructions for how the medication should be taken
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction` - dosageInstruction has change due to type change: R4B `dosageInstruction` `Dosage` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `dosageInstruction`

element.display: Encounter created as part of encounter/admission/stay

target.display: Encounter created as part of encounter/admission/stay
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.encounter`

element.display: A list of events of interest in the lifecycle

target.display: A list of events of interest in the lifecycle
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.eventHistory` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.eventHistory`
R4B `MedicationRequest.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Composite request this is part of

target.display: Composite request this is part of
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.groupIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.groupIdentifier`
R4B `MedicationRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.id`
R4B `MedicationRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.implicitRules`
R4B `MedicationRequest.insurance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.insurance`

element.display: proposal | plan | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

target.display: proposal | plan | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.intent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.intent` - intent has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-intent|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-intent|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `MedicationRequest.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `MedicationRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.meta`

R4B `MedicationRequest.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `MedicationRequest.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MedicationRequest.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

R4B `MedicationRequest.performer` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.performer` - performer changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); performer has change due to type change: R4B `performer` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `performer`

element.display: Desired kind of performer of the medication administration

target.display: Desired kind of performer of the medication administration
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.performerType` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.performerType` - performerType changed the binding strength from Example to Extensible

R4B `MedicationRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: An order/prescription that is being replaced

target.display: Reference to an order/prescription that is being replaced by this MedicationRequest
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.priorPrescription` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.priorPrescription`

element.display: Reason or indication for ordering or not ordering the medication
Condition or observation that supports why the prescription is being written

target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.recorder` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.recorder`
R4B `MedicationRequest.requester` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.requester`

element.display: active | on-hold | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | draft | unknown

target.display: active | on-hold | ended | stopped | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | draft | unknown
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-status|5.0.0 (codes match, though systems are different)
R4B `MedicationRequest.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.statusReason`

element.display: Who or group medication request is for

target.display: Individual or group for whom the medication has been requested
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.subject`
R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution`

element.display: Whether substitution is allowed or not

target.display: Whether substitution is allowed or not
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution.allowed[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution.allowed[x]` - allowed[x] changed the binding strength from Example to Preferred

R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MedicationRequest.substitution.reason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.substitution.reason`

element.display: Information to support ordering of the medication

target.display: Information to support fulfilling of the medication
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `MedicationRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MedicationRequest.text`
